script.name: plugin.planets.info
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = get global variable: name='pageid.guilds' $planet.data = get global variable: name='planets.data' do if $planet.data $planets.prod = $planet.data['production'] $this.sector = $a.obj -> get sector $sector.data = $planet.data[$this.sector] $show.production = [TRUE]
if $a.event == [MEvent.IsHidden] if not $a.obj -> is in same sector as [PLAYERSHIP] skip if $a.obj ->can player see return [TRUE] end if $planet.data $sector.data = $planet.data[$this.sector] if $sector.data $trade.dock = $sector.data['trade.dock'] do if $trade.dock == $a.obj return [FALSE] end end return [TRUE]
else if $a.event == [MEvent.IsDisabled] $docked.at = [PLAYERSHIP] -> is docked if $docked.at == $a.obj return [FALSE] else return [TRUE] end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Update] gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.data[0] $selection = $a.data[1] $value = $a.data[2] if $menu.id == 'planets.info' $datatype = datatype[ $selection ] if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_WARE if $value == 'info' $input = create input: id='ware.info' encyclopedia page, ware=$selection return $input end end end end return null
sub.BuildMenu: $prosperity = $sector.data['prosperity'] $prosperity.max = $sector.data['max.prosperity'] @ $prosperity.rate = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getRate' Value1=$prosperity Value 2=null $menu = create custom menu array
$is.consumtion = [FALSE] $is.raw = [TRUE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=2 $tProducts = $sector.data['raw.production'] gosub sub.DisplayProduction
$is.raw = [FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=6 $tProducts = $sector.data['production'] gosub sub.DisplayProduction
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=11 $is.consumtion = [TRUE] $tProducts = $sector.data['consumtion'] gosub sub.DisplayProduction
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=14 gosub sub.DisplayMissions
* Display the info for the planet $text = $a.obj -> get name $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=7 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text $text.cols = array alloc: size=5 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=8 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=9 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-400 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $percent = linear interpolation: x1=1, x2=$prosperity.max, y1=0, y2=100, value=$prosperity $text = create custom menu string progress: width=150 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-240 length=150 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=10 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-160 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[3] = $text $value = $sector.data['prosperity.level'] $value = $value / 100 $text = create custom menu string progress: width=150 progress=$value% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=150 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text.cols $text.cols[4] = $text
if $sector.data['pop'] $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=13 $text = $this.sector ->get sector population name $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text end
set menu option: $menu, icon=52 set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big]
$read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=1 $input = create input: id='planets.info', dynamic menu=$menu, title=$read.text, description=$this.sector, callback=null, update=500ms endsub
sub.CreateWareContext: set discovered status: type=$ware status=[TRUE] $context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=812 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue='info', hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id=$ware, menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] endsub
* ============================================== * Display the products table * ============================================== sub.DisplayProduction:
* Add the heading $text.cols = array alloc: size=5 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $read.text = read text: page=54 id=30 $text = create custom menu column string, position=200 length=50 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[1] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102506 $text = create custom menu column string, position=250 length=70 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[2] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=706 $text = create custom menu column string, position=330 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[3] = $text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=7102 $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=150 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text $text.cols[4] = $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text.cols
$displayed = 0 if $tProducts $sorted.array = sort table keys: table=$tProducts $size = size of array $sorted.array $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $sorted.array[$i] inc $i = * Create the return value to open ware context menu gosub sub.CreateWareContext $tSectorProd = $tProducts[$ware]
$prosperity.required = $tSectorProd['prosperity'] skip if $prosperity.required $prosperity.required = 0
inc $displayed =
if $prosperity.required > $prosperity $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=$page.id id=12 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=300 right=[FALSE] colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] text=$read.text $text.cols[0] = $text $percent = linear interpolation: x1=1, x2=$prosperity.max, y1=0, y2=100, value=$prosperity.required $text = create custom menu string progress: width=200 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=300 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Disabled] text=$text $text.cols[1] = $text add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$text.cols continue end
* Check if the local table contains production info, otherwise use the global * production table if $tSectorProd['count'] $tProductions = $tSectorProd else $tProductions = $planets.prod[$ware] end
* Crate the side menu to display additionoal information $side.menu = create custom menu array
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104408 $value = get transport class of ware $ware $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=9316 $value = get volume of ware $ware $value = convert number $value to string $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text $value = get average price of ware $ware $value = convert number $value to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s %s', $value, [Text.Credits], null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=22 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=1905 id=113 add info line heading to menu: $side.menu, heading=$read.text
$value = $tProductions['count'] @ $value = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$value $value = convert number $value to string $read.text = read text: page=54 id=30 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text
$value = $tProductions['time'] @ $value = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getTime' Value1=$value Value 2=$prosperity.rate $value = format time: $value $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1102506 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=708 add info line heading to menu: $side.menu, heading=$read.text
$has.resources = [TRUE] $tResources = $tProductions['resources'] if $tResources AND ! $is.raw $r.ware = get next key: table=$tResources key=null while $r.ware $value = $tResources[$r.ware] @ $value = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$value $obj.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $r.ware in cargo bay $text.cols = array alloc: size=2 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=0 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$r.ware $text.cols[0] = $text $text = convert number $value to string if $value > $obj.amt $has.resources = [FALSE] $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Red] text=$text else $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=[MenuColour.Green] text=$text end $text.cols[1] = $text set discovered status: type=$r.ware status=[TRUE] add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$text.cols $r.ware = get next key: table=$tResources key=$r.ware end end
$ware.text = get ware description: ware=$ware if $ware.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Encyclopedia] id=11 add info line heading to menu: $side.menu, heading=$read.text
add custom menu info line to array $side.menu: text=$ware.text end
set menu option: $side.menu, set title text=$ware set menu option: $side.menu, icon=29
$read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104203 set menu line option: $menu, side menu=$side.menu
$text.cols = array alloc: size=6 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$ware $text.cols[0] = $text $value = $tProductions['count'] @ $value = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getProdCount' Value1=$this.sector Value 2=$value $text = create custom menu column string, position=200 length=50 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$value $text.cols[1] = $text $value = $tProductions['time'] @ $value = [THIS] -> call script plugin.planets.utils : type='getTime' Value1=$value Value 2=$prosperity.rate $value = format time: $value $text = create custom menu column string, position=250 length=70 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$value $text.cols[2] = $text $obj.max = $a.obj -> get max amount of ware $ware that can be stored in cargo bay $obj.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $obj.amt * 100 / $obj.max $text = create custom menu string progress: width=80 progress=$percent% $text = create custom menu column string, position=330 length=80 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[3] = $text $obj.amt = convert number $obj.amt to string $obj.max = convert number $obj.max to string $text = sprintf: fmt='%s/%s', $obj.amt, $obj.max, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=325 length=75 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[4] = $text
if $show.production if $tSectorProd['waiting'] $value = $tSectorProd['waiting'] $value = convert number $value to string $text = sprintf: pageid=$page.id textid=5, $value, null, null, null, null else if $tSectorProd['started'] $prod.time = $tSectorProd['prod.time'] $start.time = $tSectorProd['started'] $current.time = playing time $current.time = $current.time - $start.time $percent = fixed multiply and divide: $current.time * 100 / $prod.time $remaining.time = $prod.time - $current.time $remaining.time = format time: $remaining.time $text = sprintf: fmt='%s | %s%%', $remaining.time, $percent, null, null, null $text = create custom menu column string, position=-10 length=160 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text append $text to array $text.cols
$text = create custom menu string progress: width=160 progress=$percent% else if $is.consumtion $value = $tProductions['count'] $obj.amt = $a.obj -> get amount of ware $ware in cargo bay if $value > $obj.amt $text = read text: page=$page.id id=4 else $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 end else if $has.resources OR $is.raw $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 else $text = read text: page=$page.id id=4 end end end else $text = '???' end $text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=200 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text.cols[5] = $text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text.cols returnvalue=$ret end end
if not $displayed $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text end endsub
sub.DisplayMissions: add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=689 add non selectable menu item: $menu, text=$read.text endsub return null
